definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: He developed a pruritic erythematous maculopapular rash on his lower extremities.
sentences.chinese: 他的下肢出现瘙痒性红色斑丘疹。

sentences.english: The lymphoedema of the right lower limb gradually subsided with softening of the skin after operation.
sentences.chinese: 右下肢的淋巴水肿在手术后逐渐改善并且皮肤变软。

sentences.english: Do you ever have any prickling feelings in your legs or feet? Yes No.
sentences.chinese: 你的下肢或双足出现过刺痛的感觉吗？

sentences.english: When fracture of the wounded lower limbs is secured, limbs wants curved move to show bend ancon unbend to bind.
sentences.chinese: 伤员下肢骨折固定时，肢体要弯着呈屈肘状伸直捆绑。

sentences.english: RANTES expression in venous ulceration of lower limbs;
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨下肢静脉性溃疡的治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To treat ischemia of the lower extremity, endarterectomy was performed.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨动脉内膜剥脱术治疗下肢缺血性疾病。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the therapeutic effect of deep venous insufficiency and its complications in lower limb.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结下肢深静脉瓣功能不全及并发症的治疗体会。

sentences.english: The changes at the joints of lower extremities were more obvi…
sentences.chinese: 下肢关节的改变较腕部明显。

sentences.english: Soleus muscle of two lower limbs was harvested at 7 weeks old.
sentences.chinese: 在7周龄时，解剖取出两下肢的比目鱼肌作标本。

sentences.english: Conclusion EVLT is effective for patients with superficial varicosities of the lower extremities.
sentences.chinese: 结论腔内激光治疗下肢浅静脉曲张疗效可靠。

sentences.english: Lower limbs is inflectional several, knead with big toe by sufficient the reverse side the number between each foot second.
sentences.chinese: 下肢屈曲数次，并用拇指揉按足背面各趾间数次。

sentences.english: The prevalence of scar contractures in the upper extremities was similar to that in the lower extremities.
sentences.chinese: 瘢痕挛缩的发生率在上下肢中相差无几。

sentences.english: Lower limb exoskeleton orthosis was used as rehabilitation device in gait training.
sentences.chinese: 设计用于步态康复训练的下肢外骨骼矫形器。

sentences.english: Occasionally, postoperative lower-extremity motor neuropathy occurred after the hemorrhoidectomy .
sentences.chinese: 有少数病例于术后发生下肢运动神经病变。

sentences.english: The researchers reported that 115 people had lower-limb amputations attributed to diabetes.
sentences.chinese: 该研究指出有115人由于糖尿病而导致下肢截肢。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the value of color Doppler flow imaging (CDFI)in finding the reasons of lower extremity with venous engorgement (LEVE).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨彩超在诊断下肢静脉曲张症原因中的价值。

definition: the four limbs of the body
